#summary KoL::Item::CombatItem module
#sidebar PerlTOC

= Introduction =

This object represents a Combat Item item.

This object is a subclass of [PerlKoLItemMisc KoL::Item::Misc]. Please see the documentation for more details on the functionality of this object.

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

==Methods==
===new(%args)===
This is the constructor of the object and should only ever be called by [PerlKoLItem#new(%args) KoL::Item->new()].

This object does not take any additional hash arguments beyond what [PerlKoLItemMisc#new(%args) KoL::Item::Misc->new()] uses.
